articles.description: Antioxidant-rich foods may contribute to weight loss by supporting metabolism, reducing inflammation and aiding in fat loss.
articles.content: Berries: Blueberries, strawberries, raspberries, and blackberries are rich in antioxidants like anthocyanins, which may help reduce inflammation and promote weight loss.
